[Seventh Prism](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2028)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 75 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Beloved by the church of the [Seventh Veil](/Deities.aspx?ID=46), a _seventh prism_ is a crystal that disperses its internal light, casting an aurora of color. If you use a _seventh prism_ to cast [_dizzying colors_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1500), targets are [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) for twice as long as their saving throw indicates. On a critical failure, the target is dazzled for 1 minute after its [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=59) condition ends. Motes of shifting rainbow hues cloud the eyes, making it difficult to see details.

</column>
